title: Social Media Lead Generation Agent Input

query.title: Agent Brief
query.description: High-level goal or instructions for the lead generation agent.
query.prefill: Identify AI companies hiring for growth roles and summarize recent engagement drivers across their social channels.

platforms.title: Target Platforms
platforms.description: List of social platforms to inspect with the specific profiles, hashtags, or keywords to use as scraper inputs.

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: Profile URLs, handles, hashtags, or search terms to pass to the Apify actor. Each target will be processed sequentially.

maxItems.title: Max Items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of items to fetch per target for this platform.

inputOverrides.title: Actor Input Overrides
inputOverrides.description: Raw overrides merged into the Apify actor input. Use this when you need full control over a specific actor option.

includeContactInfo.title: Include Contact Info
includeContactInfo.description: If supported by the underlying actor, attempt to fetch contact details for prospects.

maxLeads.title: Lead Cap
maxLeads.description: Maximum number of aggregated leads the agent should return across all platforms.

modelName.title: OpenAI Model
modelName.description: The OpenAI model to use for reasoning and synthesis.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable verbose logging and tool diagnostics.
